items.sentence: Tom plans on staying with us when he comes to Boston.
Tom planted a small peach tree in front of his house.
Nobody could\'ve known that this was going to happen.
Please don\'t allow the children to play with knives.
You forgot to thank Tom for the present, didn\'t you?
I just want to make sure we\'re all on the same page.
Tom doesn\'t have to pay attention to what Mary says.
Tom doesn\'t know if Mary wants to go with us or not.
Tom doesn\'t know who wrote the graffiti on the wall.
I just think you should be more careful, that\'s all.
I shouldn\'t have said the things that I said to you.
We got to Washington in time for the cherry blossoms.
We kept on working for hours without eating anything.
Whales are very large mammals that live in the ocean.
I used to think it was my responsibility to help Tom.
It makes no difference to me whether he comes or not.
It smells as though someone has been smoking in here.
The owners want you out of this house by next Monday.
The people that died were all volunteer firefighters.
The police arrested the person they think killed Tom.
